full_text: From: (USANYS)" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> Cc: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>, (b)(6) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> Subject: Re: Epstein Sent: Tue, 27 Aug 2019 12:49:57 +0000 Hi (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Thanks very much for letting us know. Would you please give me a call on my cell when you have a moment? It's (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) On Aug 27, 2019, at 8:46 AM, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> wrote: Hi (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Just a heads-up that Judge Berman invited the Warden and I to the hearing this morning. The Warden declined because of another meeting and asked to meet the Judge at a later date, but I'll be attending. I asked (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) if Judge Berman's expectation was for me to sit at counsel's table or in the galley, but she never responded. In that case, I defer to you unless we hear otherwise when we get there. Thanks, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836 (b)(6) f: 646-836-7665 >>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) USANYS" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> 7/30/2019 7:11 PM >>> Hi (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (b)(5) Thanks, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York 1 St. Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007 212-637 (b)(6) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov

text_blocks.content: From: (USANYS)" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> Cc: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>, (b)(6) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> Subject: Re: Epstein Sent: Tue, 27 Aug 2019 12:49:57 +0000
Hi (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Thanks very much for letting us know. Would you please give me a call on my cell when you have a moment? It's (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)

On Aug 27, 2019, at 8:46 AM, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> wrote: Hi (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Just a heads-up that Judge Berman invited the Warden and I to the hearing this morning. The Warden declined because of another meeting and asked to meet the Judge at a later date, but I'll be attending. I asked (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) if Judge Berman's expectation was for me to sit at counsel's table or in the galley, but she never responded. In that case, I defer to you unless we hear otherwise when we get there.
Thanks, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836 (b)(6) f: 646-836-7665

>>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) USANYS" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> 7/30/2019 7:11 PM >>> Hi (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (b)(5) Thanks, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York 1 St. Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007 212-637 (b)(6) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The content is related to a legal case involving Epstein.
